titleInfo.title: Coll 29/67 'Bandar Abbas: question of registration of the Head Clerk of the Consulate with the Persian police as a foreigner'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 20; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the British Consulate at Bandar Abbas.The file contains discussion following the Persian request that the Head Clerk of the Consulate should register as ordinary resident foreigner with the Persian Police.The file is composed of correspondence between the Foreign Office, the India Office, the Government of India, the Political Agency in the Persian Gulf, the British Consulate at Bandar Abbas, the British Consulate at Kerman, and the British Legation at Tehran.
